sn54.6:1.4: Evaṁ vutte, āyasmā ariṭṭho bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
sn54.6:1.6: “Yathā kathaṁ pana tvaṁ, ariṭṭha, bhāvesi ānāpānassatin”ti?
sn54.6:1.7: “Atītesu me, bhante, kāmesu kāmacchando pahīno, anāgatesu me kāmesu kāmacchando vigato, ajjhattabahiddhā ca me dhammesu paṭighasaññā suppaṭivinītā.
sn54.6:2.2: Api ca, ariṭṭha, yathā ānāpānassati vitthārena paripuṇṇā hoti
sn54.6:2.3: taṁ suṇāhi, sādhukaṁ manasi karohi; bhāsissāmī”ti.
sn54.6:2.4: “Evaṁ, bhante”ti kho āyasmā ariṭṭho bhagavato paccassosi.
sn54.6:3.2: Idha, ariṭṭha, bhikkhu araññagato vā rukkhamūlagato vā suññāgāragato vā nisīdati pallaṅkaṁ ābhujitvā ujuṁ kāyaṁ paṇidhāya parimukhaṁ satiṁ upaṭṭhapetvā.
sn54.6:3.6: Evaṁ kho, ariṭṭha, ānāpānassati vitthārena paripuṇṇā hotī”ti.
